fields.name: Beginner's Forest
fields.description: A pleasant hike through the forest turns scary when you are set upon by some ghosts! A good choice for your first adventure.
fields.intro_text:
You have no trouble finding a horse that you, well, borrow to take you on your first adventure. You follow several signs which lead you to the Beginner's Forest."

You see a green, vine covered arch with a locked wrought iron gate under the arch. Worked into the design of the gate are the words, "Beginners Only!"

As you look at the locked gate, you see Zeus Hightower Flabbergibungander, the local Forest Ranger, coming over to inspect you....

fields.name: You are at the entrance. (E/W)
fields.description: You are standing under a vine-covered arch with an iron gate under it. A clear trail goes west, the road to the Main Hall goes to the east. Worked into the design of the gate are the words, "Beginners Only!"

fields.name: You are on an east/west trail by a river. (S/E/W)
fields.description: You are on a clear trail going east and west. North of the trail is impassable undergrowth, a river comes from the west and the path goes west on the river bank.

fields.name: You are by the river at a T-intersection. (N/E/W)
fields.description: You are by the river. The east/west path follows the river bank, another narrower path goes north into thick underbrush.

fields.name: You are on an east/west path by the river. (S/E/W)
fields.description: You are on a path going east/west and following the river. Heavy underbrush makes it impossible to move north. It looks more open toward the west.

fields.name: You are on the beach. (N/E)
fields.description: You are on a sandy beach where the river turns east. The sand sparkles in the sun and the surface is smooth and completely undisturbed.

fields.name: You are by the beaver dam. (N/S/W)
fields.description: You are on a well marked north/south trail. The river is to the west of the path, flowing south. At this point, there is a beaver dam across the river, forming a lake to the north. You could walk west onto the dam, but it doesn't look very stable.

fields.name: You are on a bridge. (N/S)
fields.description: You are standing on a bridge over a small stream that comes out of the swamp to the east and goes into the lake to the west. The trail is well-marked and goes north and south.

fields.name: You are on the trail by the lake. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are on a north/south trail. To the east is a small break in the undergrowth that has bordered the pathway, to the west is a shallow lake.

fields.name: You are at a turn in the path. (N/S/E)
fields.description: Here the trail turns, going south along the lake shore or west at the base of a steep, mossy cliff. There appears to be an opening in the cliff side just north of you.

fields.name: You are in the cave. (S)
fields.description: You are in a shallow cave, dimly lit by light from the entrance. You can see strange markings on the wall, apparently a message written in some lost alphabet. The floor is dry and flat.

fields.name: You are on an east/west path under the cliff. (E/W/U)
fields.description: You are on a pathway going east and west at the base of a mossy overhanging cliff. The underbrush prevents you from leaving the path.

fields.name: You are on an east/west path under the cliff. (E/W/U)
fields.description: You are following a path that runs east and west under a high overhanging cliff. Moss, small ferns, and little blue flowers grow on the cliff side and sometimes drops of water fall on you. There is thick underbrush to the south.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection by the cliff. (S/E/W/U)
fields.description: You are on an east/west path that follows the base of a high overhanging cliff. Thick underbrush grows north of the path, keeping you from leaving it, but it looks like there may be a trail going south from here.

fields.name: You are at the east end of the cliff trail. (W/U)
fields.description: You are at the east end of the trail. Both north and east are blocked by the cliff, thick undergrowth keeps you from going south. Water drips from the cliff but you see handholds which you can use to climb up.

fields.name: You are on the side of the cliff. (U/D)
fields.description: You are hanging onto small holes that were carved into the cliff side making a sort of ladder. Water runs down the side making it uncomfortable and slippery.

fields.name: You are on a ledge. (D)
fields.description: You are on a ledge on the cliff side. The cliff is smooth above you but there are holes carved to make a ladder down. The ledge is only a few feet wide but soft grass and bright flowers grow on it and the sun is shining.

fields.name: You are on an indistinct path. (N/S/W)
fields.description: You are on a north/south path going through underbrush and under tall scattered trees. The path is sometimes hard to make out. There is an open area to the west.

fields.name: You are in a meadow. (E)
fields.description: You are in an open meadow surrounded by forest. Red and blue flowers bloom among the grass, dragonflies fly over the plants. There seems to be no way out except the path to the east.

fields.name: You are at an intersection. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are at an intersection of four indistinct paths. To the east is darker forest, the other three directions all look the same, open forest with heavy undergrowth.

fields.name: You are in a hidden clearing. (N/S)
fields.description: You are in a clearing, no trees and no underbrush, just blueberry plants and small purple mushrooms. Big brown beetles are sunning themselves on the path but they run away as you come near them.

fields.name: You are in the pine woods. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a dark pine forest. There is no undergrowth, only pine needles underfoot. No sunlight reaches through the tree canopy. East and west it looks lighter.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the narrow path. (S/W)
fields.description: You are on a narrow path going through the underbrush. It bends here, going west and south.

fields.name: You are on a narrow path. (N/S)
fields.description: You are on a narrow path going through the underbrush.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the narrow path. (N/E)
fields.description: You are on a narrow path going through the underbrush. It bends here, going north and east.

fields.name: You are at a bend in a narrow path. (N/W)
fields.description: You are on a narrow path going through the underbrush. The path bends here, going north and west.

fields.name: You are at the base of an oak tree. (S/U)
fields.description: You are in a small clearing, standing at the base of a tall oak tree. The only visible path goes south.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the narrow path. (N/W)
fields.description: You are on a narrow path. It bends here, going west and north.

fields.name: You are on a narrow path. (N/S)
fields.description: You are on a narrow path. It leads north and south.

fields.name: You are in the secret garden. (S)
fields.description: You are in a wild garden. All the wildflowers you know are blooming here, even those that are out of season. The garden is surrounded by trees, the only way to enter or leave is through an archway to the south.

fields.name: You are in the lake. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are standing knee-deep in the cool lake water. The banks are too steep to climb out, except on the east.

fields.name: You are at the top of the oak tree. (D)
fields.description: You have a very nice view up here. To the west you see a dark forest area leading up to a lake in the distance. To the south is a stream. You see some pathways but cannot make out any pattern. Suddenly your keen eye catches

fields.name: You are at the base of an oak tree. (S/E)
fields.description: You are in a small clearing, standing at the base of a tall oak tree. The only visible paths go south and east.

fields.name: You are at the entrance. (E/W)
fields.description: You are standing by a vine covered arch that is over an iron gate. The road to the Main Hall goes to the east, while the road that went to the west has been completely washed out.

fields.name: diamonds
fields.description: You see some diamonds sparkling among the grains of sand.

fields.name: ring
fields.description: You see a plain gold ring. Everything about it appears to be normal.

fields.name: scroll
fields.description: You see an old scroll, pushed into a crack in the rock to keep it dry. It appears to be legible.

fields.name: money bags
fields.description: You see several bags full of gold pieces and bank notes. Outside one of the bags is stenciled, "$$$ Property of Northfield Bank $$$".

fields.name: fish
fields.description: You see an artificial fish with solid gold scales sticking out of a shallow end of the lake.

fields.name: grass blade
fields.description: You see leaves and grass float by you. A long blade of grass swirls in an eddy, putting it within easy reach.

fields.name: crown
fields.description: You see a gold inlaid crown that you could WEAR on your head.

fields.name: Greenblade
fields.description: You suddenly gasp in astonishment as you see what was an ordinary blade of grass become a long, well-made sword with a magic green blade right before your eyes!

fields.name: bow
fields.description: You see a small bow.

fields.name: wooden club
fields.description: You see a piece of large tree branch that has been fashioned into a crude but effective weapon.

fields.name: sword
fields.description: You see a high-quality Marcos sword.

fields.name: axe
fields.description: You see a well-used Marcos axe.

fields.name: pistol
fields.description: You see a small pistol.

fields.name: Silverpoint
fields.description: You see a delicate, silver-tipped spear.

fields.name: flower crown
fields.description: You see a crown of unfading flowers that you could WEAR on your head.

fields.name: mace
fields.description: You see large, but ordinary, mace.

fields.name: a secret bridge leading north
fields.synonyms: giant green blanket,green blanket,giant blanket,giant green,blanket,large shape,shape
fields.description: You pull the green blanket aside and discover an invisible bridge leading north into a hidden clearing!

fields.name: captive fairy
fields.description: You see fairy trapped inside a huge glass jar. With desperate eyes, she asks you to FREE her.

fields.name: iron gate
fields.synonyms: green arch,vine covered arch,arch,vines,wrought iron gate,gate,words
fields.description: You see a green, vine covered arch with a wrought iron gate under it. Worked into the design of the gate are the words, "Beginner's Only!"

fields.name: iron gate#
fields.synonyms: green arch,vine covered arch,arch,vines,wrought iron gate,gate,words
fields.description: You see a green, vine covered arch with a wrought iron gate under it. Worked into the design of the gate are the words, "Beginner's Only!"

fields.name: unreadable message
fields.description: The markings on the wall are so worn that they are unreadable.

fields.text: As you step onto the beaver dam, it breaks under your weight. The water from behind the dam washes everything downstream, including you. You have about given up hope when you find yourself washed ashore.
something that looks suspiciously like a giant green blanket covering a large shape...
You step into the water, realizing too late that it is very deep and you cannot swim. Too bad!
You try to hold the slippery moss but you cannot keep your grasp and fall down to the hard pathway. Too bad!
The Queen greets you with a kiss, thanks you for rescuing her, and gives you a gold crown!
The Queen greets you with joy, thanks you for getting rid of the giant, and gives you a crown of unfading flowers.

You can't make any sense of the words but as you read them you feel a strange sensation. When you stop reading, you see the scroll is burning. You drop it quickly and watch it turn to ashes and the ashes blow away.
As the dead ghost sinks to the ground you see it turn to mist.
You have no trouble finding a horse that you, well, borrow to take you on your first adventure. You follow several signs which lead you to the Beginner's Forest.
You see a green, vine covered arch with a locked wrought iron gate under the arch. Worked into the design of the gate are the words, "Beginner's Only!"
You see Zeus Hightower Flabbergibungander, the local Forest Ranger, coming over to inspect you....

He says, "You know, you really should have brought at least one weapon if you planned to adventure here! Come back when you are serious." He then walks away, shaking his head and muttering to himself.

He shakes his head and says, "Who do you think you are fooling? You are clearly not a beginner and you shouldn't be here! Eamon Remastered may allow this, but I don't want any part of it." He then spits on the ground and sits down to eat his lunch, ignoring you completely as he reads the latest "Eamon Inquirer".

Eventually he says, "You may proceed." He then unlocks the gate and walks away muttering something about the Main Hall being "nothing but a meat factory for the blasted Beginner's playground racquet"...
The ring you were wearing just vanished!

A bright light suddenly breaks through the cold blackness surrounding you. A tall wizard with a long gray beard appears in the light and starts waving a wand in your direction. He informs you that he works for the Eamon Deluxe Commission for the Fair Treatment of Characters and he is attempting to save you from the no-warning death trap that you just stumbled into. Everything starts to spin around you and suddenly you fall onto familiar ground. You are still alive!

fields.name: Beaver
fields.description: You see a large, fat beaver watching you from the side of the path.

fields.name: Troll
fields.description: You see an ugly troll who waves a crude (but definitely dangerous) club and orders you off the bridge.

fields.name: Bear
fields.description: You have disturbed a foul-tempered bear.

fields.name: Sir Grummor
fields.description: You see Sir Grummor Grummorsum, a Knight of the Round Table. He is pulling petals from a daisy (she loves me, she loves me not) but jumps up when he hears you coming.

fields.name: Leprechaun
fields.description: You see a small leprechaun guarding the crossroads.

fields.name: Abradun
fields.description: You see the wizard Abradun, a subject of some disagreement among your friends in the Main Hall. Some say he is a fraud, others say he is merely incompetent. In any case he picks up his axe when he hears you.

fields.name: Jesse James Paris
fields.description: You see a desperado, burying the loot from his last bank holdup. He hears you coming and pulls out a pistol.

fields.name: Fairy Queen
fields.description: You see the Queen of the Fairies, a lovely creature, even though she's just a bit transparent. She thanks you for freeing her from the giant.

fields.name: Ghost
fields.description: You see rise from the water a ghostly shape. It heads toward you with burning eyes!

fields.name: Giant
fields.description: You see a giant, about ten feet tall, waving a mace and muttering, "Fee fie foe fum - I'm hungry."

fields.name: Ranger Flabbergibungander
fields.description: You see Zeus Hightower Flabbergibungander. Seasoned member of the Guild of Eamon Forest Rangers (under the sign of three acorns). He doesn't agree with the Eamon Remastered policy of allowing non-beginner characters into the forest and is pretending that you aren't here.

fields.question: Beginner's Forest -- Help! There are too many spooks!
Secrets of the Beginner's Forest. (For your amusement...)

fields.answer: The ten cardboard cut-out "spooks" that will come after you in part of this adventure can be a little unfair for begining level characters. If you wish, you can reduce the total amount of spooks to two if you SAY LESS SPOOKS.

SPOILER ALERT! The following contains a complete list of all the special things you can do which are unique to this adventure. This will also spoil any surprises if you are still exploring. Only read ahead if you are sure you want everything revealed.

In the Beginner's Forest you can: Get different results from the Ranger if you are a beginner, are not a beginner, or forget to bring at least one weapon; Get different results from the Fairy Queen depending upon your gender;

...Get a magic sword from the Fairy Queen if you are carrying the blade of grass (or it is in the room) when you first meet her; Sir Grummor will always be initially friendly if your character is female (75% chance of friendliness for male characters);

...WEAR the ring to activate a SPEED spell (note: the ring vanishes when the spell wears off); Automatically get ressurected and placed at the entrance if you step into the unfair death traps that were in the original version of the Beginner's Forest;
...Find a secret bridge if you EXAMINE SHAPE at the top of the oak tree; end up at the entrance with the path to the Beginner's Forest gone if you go west from the beaver dam.
